metadata.title: CVE-2019-20840 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13.libvncserver/ws_decode.c can lead to a crash because of unaligned accessesin hybiReadAndDecode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.3').
x11vnc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
